---
title: McMurray's Test
subtitle: Special test for Knee Meniscus dysfunction
---

:::{.callout-caution}
Clinical Directors and CIs have advised against the use of this test, in favor of other tests such as [Apley's Test]({{< var ref-meniscus.test.apleys.path >}}) or [Thessaly's Test]({{< var ref-meniscus.test.thessalys.path >}})
:::


# Meniscus Bias

:::{layout-ncol="2"}

### Lateral Meniscus

- IR + Varus stress

### Medial Meniscus

- ER + Valgus


:::
